item.title: Data Privacy Day Matters Now More Than Ever
item.description: From connected devices to AI-powered tools, the convenience of our digital lives comes at a price: the erosion of privacy.

item.title: DeepSeek Unlocks Golden Opportunity For IT Infrastructure Providers
item.description: DeepSeek removes cost barriers to AI training, opening the door to much broader adoption and competition in the IT infrastructure market.

item.title: After Raising $77.5 Million, ShopMy CEO Shares Vision For Next Chapter
item.description: ShopMy has secured $77.5 million in Series B funding led by Bessemer Venture Partners and Bain Capital Ventures, with participation from Menlo Venture...

item.title: Kost√ºme Crowdfunds After 200% Growth In Depressed Cycling Market
item.description: The raise goes public on January 30 but, via a call-out last week to the company's mailing list, two-thirds of the target was reachedwithin 36 hours.

item.title: Google To Let Users Turn Off Divisive Google Photos Feature
item.description: Google is considering backtracking somewhat on a significant new photo sharing feature, currently under test.
